item.title: Legal Basis of European Union Laws
item.description:
Upon completion, this site will host datasets developed during my PhD project. Three interoperable datasets are envisaged:

  1. Legal basis of EU legislation
  2. Legal basis in Commission proposals
  3. Legal basis in EU Treaties (manually coded)

Legal basis of EU legislation
